name: Shattered Skies (request)
description:
Use a huge greatsword to slash your way through a deserted riverside village, in pursuit of a mysterious masked man. He has frozen the sky over, and now it's falling down in shards - dangerous!

This game is playable on any SteamVR-compatible headset.

This project is on GitHub! If you're interested, you can also check out my other projects at request.moe!
